sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNEVENTINFO SET EVENT_SVC_BGNDE=REPLACE(#eventSvcBeginDe#,'-',''), SVC_USE_NMPR_CO=#svcUseNmprCo#, CHARGER_NM=#chargerNm#, EVENT_CN=#eventCn#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId#, EVENT_SVC_ENDDE=REPLACE(#eventSvcEndDe#,'-',''), EVENT_TY_CODE=#eventTyCode#, EVENT_CONFM_AT=#eventConfmAt#, EVENT_CONFM_DE=REPLACE(#eventConfmDe#,'-',''), PRPARETG_CN=#prparetgCn# WHERE EVENT_ID = #eventId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EVENT_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVENT_SVC_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_SVC_BGNDE, SVC_USE_NMPR_CO, CHARGER_NM, EVENT_CN, EVENT_CONFM_AT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVENT_CONFM_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_CONFM_DE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVENT_SVC_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_SVC_ENDDE, EVENT_TY_CODE, PRPARETG_CN FROM COMTNEVENTINFO WHERE 1=1 AND EVENT_ID = #eventId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.EVENT_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EVENT_SVC_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_SVC_BGNDE, A.SVC_USE_NMPR_CO, A.CHARGER_NM, A.EVENT_CN, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EVENT_SVC_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVENT_SVC_ENDDE, A.EVENT_TY_CODE, A.PRPARETG_CN FROM COMTNEVENTINFO A WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%' )
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNEVENTINFO WHERE 1=1
AND EVENT_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%' )

ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
